name: Jumping Frog (hshsilver)
description:
- Slides  - 

Game Design HW2 Group 8 Slides

 - “Jumping Frog” - 

In a universe, there lives a red frog.

The frog needs to go cross a river via a lotus leaf. 

The frog can hold more power to jump farther.

 - Control - 

Press and hold space to adjust the power 

Power ranges from 1 to 5.

Release space to jump! Good luck!
